message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm trying to be fair to both of us, considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I'm motivated to sell, $12,500 is a bit too low for me. Could we agree on $13,500? This would represent a fair compromise for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $13,000?
